# A-GH-AlgoOptimizer Technical Specification

## 1. Core Algorithm Logic

### 1.1 Optimization Function

```
f(x) = argmin[Σᵢ₌₁ⁿ (wᵢ · Cᵢ(x)) + λ · R(x)]

Where:
- x ∈ ℝᵈ : parameter vector
- Cᵢ(x) : cost function for component i
- wᵢ : weight coefficient, Σwᵢ = 1
- R(x) : regularization term
- λ : regularization coefficient [0.001, 0.1]
```

### 1.2 Gradient Descent Implementation

```
θₜ₊₁ = θₜ - η · ∇L(θₜ) + μ · (θₜ - θₜ₋₁)

Learning Rate Decay:
η(t) = η₀ / (1 + δ · t)

Convergence Criterion:
|L(θₜ₊₁) - L(θₜ)| < ε, where ε = 1e-6
```

### 1.3 Adaptive Threshold Calculation

```
T_adaptive = μ + k · σ · √(1 + 1/n + (x - x̄)²/Σ(xᵢ - x̄)²)

Where:
- μ : rolling mean (window = 300s)
- σ : rolling standard deviation
- k : sensitivity factor [2.0, 3.5]
- n : sample size
```

---

## 2. Breakdown Point Score (BPS) Matrix

### 2.1 BPS Calculation Formula

```
BPS = Σⱼ₌₁ᵐ (Iⱼ · Pⱼ · Sⱼ) / m

Where:
- Iⱼ : Impact score [1-10]
- Pⱼ : Probability of occurrence [0-1]
- Sⱼ : Severity multiplier [1-5]
- m : total failure modes
```

### 2.2 Operational Failure Risk Matrix

| Failure Mode | Impact (I) | Probability (P) | Severity (S) | BPS | Threshold |
|--------------|------------|-----------------|--------------|-----|-----------|
| Memory Exhaustion | 9 | 0.15 | 4 | 5.40 | >4.0 CRITICAL |
| CPU Saturation | 8 | 0.20 | 3 | 4.80 | >4.0 CRITICAL |
| Network Partition | 10 | 0.05 | 5 | 2.50 | >2.0 HIGH |
| Disk I/O Bottleneck | 7 | 0.25 | 3 | 5.25 | >4.0 CRITICAL |
| Algorithm Divergence | 10 | 0.08 | 5 | 4.00 | >4.0 CRITICAL |
| State Corruption | 10 | 0.03 | 5 | 1.50 | >1.0 MEDIUM |
| Dependency Timeout | 6 | 0.30 | 2 | 3.60 | >3.0 HIGH |
| Config Drift | 5 | 0.35 | 2 | 3.50 | >3.0 HIGH |
| Queue Overflow | 8 | 0.12 | 4 | 3.84 | >3.0 HIGH |
| Checkpoint Failure | 9 | 0.07 | 4 | 2.52 | >2.0 HIGH |

### 2.3 Aggregate Risk Score

```
ARS = √(Σᵢ BPSᵢ²) / n

Risk Classification:
- ARS < 2.0  : NOMINAL
- ARS ∈ [2.0, 3.5) : ELEVATED
- ARS ∈ [3.5, 5.0) : HIGH
- ARS ≥ 5.0 : CRITICAL
```

## 3. JSON Schema for Input Validation

```json
{
  "$schema": "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema",
  "$id": "https://sre.internal/schemas/a-gh-algooptimizer/v1",
  "title": "A-GH-AlgoOptimizer Input Schema",
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["metadata", "parameters", "constraints", "objectives"],
  "additionalProperties": false,
  "properties": {
    "metadata": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["request_id", "timestamp", "version", "source"],
      "properties": {
        "request_id": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "^[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-4[a-f0-9]{3}-[89ab][a-f0-9]{3}-[a-f0-9]{12}$"
        },
        "timestamp": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "date-time"
        },
        "version": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "^\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+$"
        },
        "source": {
          "type": "string",
          "minLength": 1,
          "maxLength": 64
        },
        "priority": {
          "type": "integer",
          "minimum": 0,
          "maximum": 10,
          "default": 5
        }
      }
    },
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["learning_rate", "max_iterations", "batch_size"],
      "properties": {
        "learning_rate": {
          "type": "number",
          "exclusiveMinimum": 0,
          "maximum": 1.0
        },
        "max_iterations": {
          "type": "integer",
          "minimum": 100,
          "maximum": 1000000
        },
        "batch_size": {
          "type": "integer",
          "minimum": 1,
          "maximum": 65536,
          "multipleOf": 1
        },
        "momentum": {
          "type": "number",
          "minimum": 0,
          "maximum": 0.99,
          "default": 0.9
        },
        "regularization_lambda": {
          "type": "number",
          "minimum": 0.0001,
          "maximum": 0.5,
          "default": 0.01
        },
        "convergence_epsilon": {
          "type": "number",
          "exclusiveMinimum": 0,
          "maximum": 0.001,
          "default": 1e-6
        },
        "weight_vector": {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "type": "number",
            "minimum": 0,
            "maximum": 1
          },
          "minItems": 1,
          "maxItems": 256
        }
      }
    },
    "constraints": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["resource_limits", "time_bounds"],
      "properties": {
        "resource_limits": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "max_memory_mb": {
              "type": "integer",
              "minimum": 256,
              "maximum": 524288
            },
            "max_cpu_cores": {
              "type": "number",
              "minimum": 0.1,
              "maximum": 256
            },
            "max_gpu_memory_mb": {
              "type": "integer",
              "minimum": 0,
              "maximum": 81920
            }
          }
        },
        "time_bounds": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "timeout_seconds": {
              "type": "integer",
              "minimum": 1,
              "maximum": 86400
            },
            "checkpoint_interval_seconds": {
              "type": "integer",
              "minimum": 10,
              "maximum": 3600,
              "default": 300
            }
          }
        },
        "bounds": {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["dimension", "min", "max"],
            "properties": {
              "dimension": {
                "type": "integer",
                "minimum": 0
              },
              "min": {
                "type": "number"
              },
              "max": {
                "type": "number"
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "objectives": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["primary_metric", "optimization_direction"],
      "properties": {
        "primary_metric": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": ["latency_p99", "throughput", "error_rate", "cost", "custom"]
        },
        "optimization_direction": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": ["minimize", "maximize"]
        },
        "secondary_metrics": {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["metric", "weight"],
            "properties": {
              "metric": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "weight": {
                "type": "number",
                "minimum": 0,
                "maximum": 1
              }
            }
          },
          "maxItems": 10
        },
        "target_value": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "acceptable_deviation": {
          "type": "number",
          "minimum": 0
        }
      }
    },
    "data_source": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "type": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": ["streaming", "batch", "hybrid"]
        },
        "uri": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uri"
        },
        "format": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": ["parquet", "avro", "json", "csv", "protobuf"]
        },
        "schema_registry_url": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uri"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## 4. SRE Metrics for Operational Success

### 4.1 Service Level Indicators (SLIs)

| Metric | Formula | Target | Measurement Window |
|--------|---------|--------|-------------------|
| Availability | `(total_time - downtime) / total_time × 100` | ≥99.95% | 30d rolling |
| Latency P50 | `percentile(request_duration, 0.50)` | ≤50ms | 5m |
| Latency P99 | `percentile(request_duration, 0.99)` | ≤200ms | 5m |
| Latency P99.9 | `percentile(request_duration, 0.999)` | ≤500ms | 5m |
| Error Rate | `error_count / total_requests × 100` | ≤0.1% | 5m |
| Throughput | `successful_requests / time_window` | ≥10,000 RPS | 1m |
| Saturation | `resource_used / resource_limit × 100` | ≤80% | 1m |

### 4.2 Service Level Objectives (SLOs)

```yaml
slos:
  - name: optimizer_availability
    target: 99.95
    window: 30d
    burn_rate_alerts:
      - severity: critical
        short_window: 5m
        long_window: 1h
        burn_rate: 14.4
      - severity: warning
        short_window: 30m
        long_window: 6h
        burn_rate: 6.0

  - name: optimization_latency
    target: 99.0
    threshold_ms: 200
    window: 7d
    
  - name: convergence_success_rate
    target: 99.5
    window: 7d
```

### 4.3 Golden Signals Metrics

```
# Request Rate
rate(optimizer_requests_total[5m])

# Error Rate
sum(rate(optimizer_requests_total{status=~"5.."}[5m])) / 
sum(rate(optimizer_requests_total[5m]))

# Latency Distribution
histogram_quantile(0.99, 
  sum(rate(optimizer_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m])) by (le))

# Saturation
avg(optimizer_queue_depth) / optimizer_queue_capacity
```

### 4.4 Algorithm-Specific Metrics

| Metric | Type | Labels | Description |
|--------|------|--------|-------------|
| `optimizer_iterations_total` | Counter | `algorithm`, `status` | Total optimization iterations |
| `optimizer_convergence_time_seconds` | Histogram | `algorithm` | Time to convergence |
| `optimizer_loss_value` | Gauge | `algorithm`, `iteration` | Current loss function value |
| `optimizer_gradient_norm` | Gauge | `algorithm` | L2 norm of gradient |
| `optimizer_parameter_updates` | Counter | `dimension` | Parameter update count |
| `optimizer_checkpoint_size_bytes` | Gauge | `checkpoint_id` | Checkpoint storage size |
| `optimizer_memory_allocated_bytes` | Gauge | `pool` | Memory allocation |
| `optimizer_batch_processing_seconds` | Histogram | `batch_size` | Batch processing time |

### 4.5 Alerting Thresholds

```yaml
alerts:
  - name: HighErrorRate
    expr: |
      sum(rate(optimizer_requests_total{status="error"}[5m])) /
      sum(rate(optimizer_requests_total[5m])) > 0.01
    for: 2m
    severity: critical
    
  - name: LatencyDegradation
    expr: |
      histogram_quantile(0.99, 
        sum(rate(optimizer_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m])) by (le)
      ) > 0.5
    for: 5m
    severity: warning
    
  - name: AlgorithmDivergence
    expr: |
      increase(optimizer_loss_value[5m]) > 0 and 
      optimizer_iterations_total > 1000
    for: 1m
    severity: critical
    
  - name: MemorySaturation
    expr: |
      optimizer_memory_allocated_bytes / 
      optimizer_memory_limit_bytes > 0.9
    for: 3m
    severity: warning
    
  - name: CheckpointFailure
    expr: |
      increase(optimizer_checkpoint_failures_total[10m]) > 0
    for: 0m
    severity: critical
    
  - name: QueueBackpressure
    expr: |
      optimizer_queue_depth / optimizer_queue_capacity > 0.8
    for: 5m
    severity: warning
```

### 4.6 Operational Health Score (OHS)

```
OHS = Π(SLIᵢ / SLOᵢ)^wᵢ × 100

Where:
- SLIᵢ : measured SLI value
- SLOᵢ : target SLO value  
- wᵢ : weight for metric i, Σwᵢ = 1

Component Weights:
- Availability: 0.35
- Latency: 0.25
- Error Rate: 0.20
- Throughput: 0.10
- Saturation: 0.10

Health Classification:
- OHS ≥ 95 : HEALTHY
- OHS ∈ [85, 95) : DEGRADED
- OHS ∈ [70, 85
```]]]]

Saturation ratios for CPU, RAM, and GPU during execution.
